text:
@sdr_medco REALITY CHECK:

* 40,000,000 + unemployed (larger number than the entire population of Canada

* 2,000,000 + CASES OF COVID-19

Trump's priority is proving he can drink water like a grown up and walk down a ramp. HE IS TRULY INSANE !!!
